steps.name: BeforeEach Hook
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/
Disable cookies
Log in as the employer user
Click "LOG IN"
Enter email: AQA-CI-gSaUi-1430-U-Empl-yjJnX@test.com
Enter password: AQA-CI-gSaUi-1430-U-Empl-yjJnX
Click "LOG IN"
Verify that the user is logged
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/account/transactions
Verify that the Employer user does not have transactions
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/account/projects/employer
Open AQA-CI-gSaUi-1430-P-yjJnX project
Click "Approve"
Verify that the status is Completed
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/account/transactions
Verify payment cards for the freelancer user
Verify payment card
Verify that the Date is Today
Verify that the Project title is Fees for AQA-CI-gSaUi-1430-P-yjJnX
Verify that the Project duration is Fees
Verify that the Amount is - € 121,00
Verify that the Status is pending...
Verify payment card
Verify that the Date is Today
Verify that the Project title is AQA-CI-gSaUi-1430-P-yjJnX
Verify that the Project duration is Milestone release (XxLjsXJipV)
Verify that the Amount is - € 1210,00
Verify that the Status is pending...
Verify payment cards for the milestone
